TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Parameter extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class Parameter Implements ICloneable, IStateManager
public ref class Parameter : ICloneable, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type Parameter = class interface ICloneable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 为数据源控件提供一种绑定到应用程序变量、用户标识和选择以及其他数据的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that data source controls use to bind to application variables, user identities and choices, and other data.

summary.span: 作为所有 ASP.NET 参数类型的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET parameter types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示参数化 SQL 查询中的参数、筛选表达式或 ASP.NET 数据源控件用来选择、筛选或修改数据的业务对象方法调用。The class represents a parameter in a parameterized SQL query, a filtering expression, or a business object method call that an ASP.NET data source control uses to select, filter, or modify data. 对象包含在一个 对象中。 objects are contained in a object. 对象在运行时进行计算，将它们所表示的变量值绑定到数据源控件用来与数据进行交互的任何方法。 objects are evaluated at run time, to bind the values of the variables they represent to whatever method is used by a data source control to interact with data. 使用通过数据源和数据绑定控件派生 的类来生成基于 Web 的数据应用程序。Use classes that derive from with data source and data-bound controls to build Web-based data applications. 数据源控件使用这些参数类将在 Web 应用程序中找到的特定类型的值绑定到 SQL 查询字符串、业务对象方法参数等中的占位符。These parameter classes are used by data source controls to bind specific kinds of values found in Web applications to placeholders in SQL query strings, business object method parameters, and more. 下表列出了 ASP.NET 中包含的参数类型。The following table lists parameter types that are included in ASP.NET. ||| |-|-| ||绑定 Web 服务器控件的任何公共属性。Binds any public property of a Web server control.| ||绑定窗体字段。Binds a form field.| ||绑定会话状态字段。Binds a session-state field.| ||绑定路由 URL 参数。Binds a route URL parameter.| ||绑定 cookie 字段。Binds a cookie field.| ||绑定查询字符串参数。Binds a query-string parameter.| ||绑定配置文件字段。Binds a profile field.| 如果要实现自己的自定义参数类型，请扩展基本 类。Extend the base class when you want to implement your own custom parameter types. 对象非常简单：它们具有 和 属性，可通过声明方式表示，并且可以跟踪多个 HTTP 请求的状态。 objects are very simple: they have a and a property, can be represented declaratively, and can track state across multiple HTTP requests. 对于参数绑定到值的情况，所有参数都支持 属性，但在运行时值的计算结果为 `null`。All parameters support a property, for cases when a parameter is bound to a value, but the value evaluates to `null` at run time. 使用带有数据源控件的 对象的集合时，它们在集合中的顺序可能很重要。When using a collection of objects with a data source control, their order in the collection might matter. 有关如何使用参数的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)一起使用和[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information on how parameters are used, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 SQL 查询的 W`here` 子句中使用 控件的所选值。The following example shows how to use the selected value of a control in the W`here` clause of a SQL query. 该示例使用派生自 类的 类。The example uses the class, which derives from the class. 元素使用名为 "@Title" 的参数定义查询，其中 `DropDownList1` 的值应为。The element defines the query with a parameter named "@Title" where the value from `DropDownList1` should go. 元素指定将 "@Title" 占位符替换为 `DropDownList1` 控件的 属性的值。The element specifies that the "@Title" placeholder will be replaced by the value of the property of the `DropDownList1` control. 元素添加到 控件的 集合。The element is added to the collection of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例与前一个示例类似，但使用代码而不是标记。The following example is like the previous one, but uses code instead of markup. 第一次加载页面时， 控件没有选定值，并使用 对象的 属性。When the page loads the first time, the control has no selected value, and the property of the object is used. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/CS/param1acs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/VB/param1avb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码显示了上一示例中页的代码隐藏类。The following code shows the code-behind class for the page in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/CS/param1acs.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/VB/param1avb.aspx.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类，以创建可供数据源控件和数据绑定方案中的其他控件使用的新参数类型。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a new parameter type that can be used by data source controls and other controls in data-binding scenarios. 数据源控件可以使用 `StaticParameter` 参数绑定到 Web 窗体页上声明的任何对象（通常为字符串）的值。A data source control can use a `StaticParameter` parameter to bind to the value of any object, typically a string, declared on a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 复制构造函数以使用当前实例的值初始化 类的新实例。The method calls the copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the class with the values of the current instance. 如果扩展 类，则可以重写 方法以包含应复制到派生类的新实例的任何状态。If you extend the class, you can override the method to include any state that should be copied to a new instance of your derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从扩展 类的类中调用 构造函数，以实现类的正确对象克隆行为。The following code example demonstrates how to call the constructor from a class that extends the class to implement correct object cloning behavior for the class. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置参数的数据库类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the database type of the parameter.
The database type of the instance.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据库类型可用于创建强类型参数，以便在 Web 应用程序与基础代码之间或数据库表中的值之间正确转换值。The database type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code or values from database tables. 如果通过设置 属性更改了参数的数据库类型，则调用 方法。If the database type of the parameter is changed by setting the property, the method is called.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为 枚举值以外的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

member this.DefaultValue : string with get, set

summary.span: 指定参数的默认值（如果调用 方法时参数绑定到的值未被初始化）。

span.span: Specifies a default value for the parameter, should the value that the parameter is bound to be uninitialized when the method is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，当 绑定到的值无法解析或者未初始化时，该字符串作为参数对象的默认值。

span.span: A string that serves as a default value for the when the value it is bound to cannot be resolved or is uninitialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在参数绑定到值的情况下使用 属性，但在计算 对象时，该值 `null` 或无法解析。The property is used in scenarios where the parameter is bound to a value, but the value is `null` or cannot be resolved when the object is evaluated. 如果更改了参数的 属性，则调用 方法。If the property of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件检索单个数据记录并将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control and display it in a control. 控件通过调用 `EmployeeLogic` 类的 `GetEmployee` 方法来检索特定的雇员记录。The control retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee` 方法需要 employee ID 参数。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控件使用其 集合中的 对象将 ID 传递到此示例中的 `GetEmployee` 方法。The control uses a object in its collection to pass an ID to the `GetEmployee` method in this example. 若要查看 `EmployeeLogic` 类和 `GetEmployee` 方法的示例实现，请参阅 类概述。To view the example implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class and the `GetEmployee` method, see the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/CS/objds3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/VB/objds3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::ParameterDirection Direction { System::Data::ParameterDirection get(); void set(System::Data::ParameterDirection value); };
member this.Direction : System.Data.ParameterDirection with get, set

summary.span: 指示 对象是否用于将值绑定到控件，或者是否可以使用控件更改值。

span.span: Indicates whether the object is used to bind a value to a control, or the control can be used to change the value.
One of the values.

value.span: 默认情况下， 设置为 。

span.span: is set to by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性当前未由 类使用，保留供将来使用。The property is currently not used by the class and is reserved for future use. 属性描述 实例绑定到的值与 对象本身之间的数据流方向。The property describes the direction of the flow of data between the value that a instance is bound to and the object itself. 的 属性的默认值描述了数据流动始终处于一个方向的最常见方案： 对象绑定到 对象的值。The default value for the property, , describes the most common scenario where the flow of data is always in one direction: from the value to which the object is bound to the object. 对基础值所做的任何更改都将由 对象反映，但对 对象所做的任何更改都不会反映到基础数据。Any changes made to the underlying value are reflected by the object, but any changes to the object are not reflected by the underlying data. 使用输出参数时，可以将 属性设置为 或 ，或在处理来自存储过程的返回值时将其设置为 。You can set the property to or when working with output parameters, or when working with a return value from a stored procedure. 如果更改了参数的 属性，则调用 方法。If the property of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置 对象的 、和 属性，同时将它们用作存储过程的输出参数和返回值参数。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties of objects when using them as output parameters and return value parameters with a stored procedure. 此代码示例是为 类概述提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的默认实现是在所有情况下都返回 `null`。The default implementation of the method is to return `null` in all cases. 派生自 类的类将重写 方法以返回更新的参数值。Classes that derive from the class override the method to return an updated parameter value. 例如， 对象将返回它所绑定到的控件的值，而 对象则从 对象检索当前名称/值对。For example, the object returns the value of the control that it is bound to, while the object retrieves the current name/value pair from the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便在派生自 类的类中返回正确的值。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to return the correct value in a class that is derived from the class. 此代码示例是为 类概述提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 此方法从 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原 对象的视图状态信息。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置参数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the parameter.
The name of the parameter.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象不需要具有名称;但是，数据源控件可以使用参数名来匹配集合中的 对象以及 SQL 查询或业务方法签名中的参数。 objects are not required to have a name; however, data source controls might use the parameter name to match a object in a collection with a parameter in a SQL query or business method signature. 例如， 控件可以使用 对象的名称来匹配参数化 SQL 查询中的占位符。For example, the control can use the name of the object to match a placeholder in a parameterized SQL query. 同样， 控件可以使用 集合中 对象的名称来匹配 属性中的占位符。Similarly, the control can use the name of a object in the collection to match a placeholder in the property. 在某些情况下，不使用该名称，并且将 对象添加到 集合的顺序更重要。In some cases, the name is not used and the order in which the object is added to a collection is more important. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将参数用于 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)和[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 如果更改了参数的名称，则调用 方法。If the name of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件显示筛选的数据，以便从中间层业务对象中检索数据，并使用 控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 此代码示例由 控件、 控件、 控件和提交按钮组成。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a Submit button. 默认情况下， 控件使用 `Northwind` 员工之一的名称进行填充。By default, the control is populated with the name of one of the `Northwind` employees. 控件显示 控件中由名称标识的员工的相关信息。The control displays information about the employee identified by the name in the control. 若要检索另一个雇员的数据，请在 控件中输入雇员的全名，并单击按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the control and click the button. 属性指定一个表达式，该表达式用于筛选 属性检索的数据。The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the property. 它使用计算结果为 集合中包含的参数的参数占位符。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符由单引号界定，因为参数的类型是可能包含空格的字符串类型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型是数值或日期类型，则不需要用到边界引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not needed. 此代码示例是为 类的 属性提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnParameterChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 调用包含 对象的 集合的 方法。

span.span: Calls the method of the collection that contains the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 集合不包含 对象，则调用 方法不起作用。If the object is not contained by a collection, calling the method has no effect. 如果 对象包含 集合， 将引发集合的 事件。If the object is contained by a collection, raises the event of the collection. 如果 集合包含在数据源控件中，则 事件将引发数据源控件的 事件，从而导致任何数据绑定控件重新绑定。If the collection is contained by a data source control, the event raises the data source control's event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何调用 方法，以便在参数的状态发生更改时引发 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to raise the event when the state of a parameter changes. 此代码示例是为 类概述提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#7)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
abstract member SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 自页回发到服务器开始，将更改保存到 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与此对象关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在 HTML `hidden` 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

summary.span: 获取或设置参数类型。

The type of the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型可用于创建强类型参数，以便在 Web 应用程序和基础代码之间正确转换值。The type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code. 如果参数的类型发生更改，则调用 方法。If the type of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置 对象的 、和 属性，同时将它们用作存储过程的输出参数和返回值参数。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties of objects when using them as output parameters and return value parameters with a stored procedure. 此代码示例是为 类概述提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含 对象的视图状态信息的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of that contains the object's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A parameter's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要跨 HTTP 请求保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性（ 类的实例）来存储属性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 然后，在处理后续请求时，这些值将作为变量传递给 HTML `hidden` input 元素。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML `hidden` input element when subsequent requests are processed. 默认情况下，为所有服务器控件启用视图状态。View state is enabled for all server controls by default. 有关字典以及如何使用它们的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用视图状态对象将参数对象状态存储在扩展 类的类中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the view-state object to store parameter object state in a class that extends the class. 此代码示例是为 类概述提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#5)]
